Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.GameComponents

Class Codex

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.GameComponents.Codex
All Implemented Interfaces:
CodexInterface, Serializable
public class Codex extends Object implements CodexInterface, Serializable
Class that represents the codex of a player, where all the cards, resources and scores are stored
See Also:
